items.title: Arrange the overview to your liking
items.detail: View your accounts, savings, and cards the way you like it. And hide whatever you don’t need to see.

items.title: Keep your account balance private
items.detail: You can hide or view your balances in one tap. Whenever you need.

items.title: Light, dark, colorful... You choose the look
items.detail: In Settings, you can find themes and switch between them according to your taste and mood. Both in dark and light mode.

items.title: Compact view for multiple accounts
items.detail: If you have multiple accounts, you can hide transactions for them, and for savings accounts, also displayed envelopes. Look for the Compact View option.

items.title: Font size adapts to your needs
items.detail: Is the font on your device set larger? Smart Banka can mirror the settings. You can enable it in Settings, System font size.

items.title: What can your Smart Banka do?
items.detail: In the new section, we will gradually introduce you to the innovations and features that Smart Banka offers, making banking easier for you.

items.title: Make use of biometrics with  Smart Banka
items.detail: Enable login and payment confirmation via biometrics. Your phone protects your data via fingerprint or face scan.

items.title: Be mindful of incoming texts, they might be fraudulent
items.detail: Hackers often send phishing texts and emails claiming to be somebody you trust, such as your bank.

items.title: Watch out for investment fraud
items.detail: First, the hackers offer great investment opportunities, then they ask you to install remote-access application (AnyDesk, TeamViewer), which allows them to gain access of your device.

items.title: The fastest way to get in touch with us is via Smart Banka
items.detail: Call us through Smart Bank so you don't have to verify that it's really you.

items.title: Got a new phone? Pair Smart Banka using QR code
items.detail: In Smart Banka Settings on your old phone, select Pair a new Device. Download Smart Banka on your new phone and select Pair using QR code.

items.title: Forgot your Internet Banka password?
items.detail: Recover your password within moments in Smart Banka.

items.title: Drag and drop makes transfers between your own accounts easier
items.detail: Just hold your finger on the account from which you wish to make the transfer, and drag it over another account, e.g., your savings account, and let go. Then, you select the amount and confirm the transfer. You can also use drag and & drop on savings envelopes.

items.title: Set limits as you need them
items.detail: Set limits for payments and cash withdrawals within seconds.

items.title: Save time with smart QR payments
items.detail: Just scan the QR code and confirm the payment. Easy, right?

items.title: Create and cancel standing orders and direct debits
items.detail: You don’t need to mark down important payments in your calendar. Set up a standing order or direct debit instead. You can find it in Menu under More and Payments and Cards.

items.title: Foreign payments
items.detail: No matter if you send money abroad or domestically. Just tap the payment icon and select Foreign payment.

items.title: Notification of declined card payments
items.detail: In case your payment happens to fail, we will let you know why it happened and how you can resolve it.

items.title: The Card section is now easier to navigate
items.detail: We have redesigned the Card section where you can find all important information.

items.title: Activate your card in Smart Banka
items.detail: There is no need to go to the ATM or Internet Banka to activate your payment card anymore.

items.title: Leave your card at home, view the details in Smart Banka
items.detail: The card number as well as the CVC code can be viewed in the app.

items.title: Need cash? We’ll show you the way
items.detail: With our map of ATMs and branches you will never wander around looking for an ATM again.

items.title: Don’t put your dreams on hold. Save up for them using envelopes
items.detail: Envelopes make it easier to save up for whatever your heart desires. It’s easy and paperless. You can use the drag and drop feature that you already know.

items.title: Transaction history with logos of retailers
items.detail: Every other transaction in Smart Banka has a logo. We are currently working on adding the rest.

items.title: Access your account from anywhere, even your wrist
items.detail: Keep an overview of your finances even on your smartwatch.

items.title: Close Savings Account Online
items.detail: If you no longer want to use old savings accounts, you can easily close them by going to the detail section of the account. Tap on More and then Close this Current Account.

items.title: Close Building Savings  Account online
items.detail: Hit your savings goal? You can close your Building Savings Account online and transfer the funds to wherever you need. Go to the Detail section of your Building Savings Account and close the account.

items.title: Deactivation of the payment card
items.detail: Have you lost your card or has it been stolen? You can quickly block or cancel it in your Smart Banka. Immediately afterward, you can request a new one.

items.title: Easter Theme
items.detail: Switch your Smart Banka to Easter colors. You can find more colorful themes in Settings and switch between them whenever you like.

items.title: Copy your account number
items.detail: In Smart Banka, tap the three dots next to the name of the account, and then tap the ‘copy’ icon. You can then paste it wherever you need.

items.title: Open a savings account
items.detail: Considering saving up or finding a simple way to appreciate your savings? Open a savings account. You can find it in Overview or in the ‘Savings’ section. The process is fully online and only takes a few minutes.

items.title: Rename your account
items.detail:
1. Tap the three dots next to the name of the account to view the details.
2. Tap the the arrow icon next to the balance and a little pencil will pop up.
3. Tap the icon and change the name to whatever you like.

items.title: Pay Me Function
items.detail: You can share your account number or QR code with your payment details using the ‘Pay Me’ feature. You can find it in account detail, and you can share your payment information right from Smart Banka within seconds.

items.title: Get a loan
items.detail: You can get a personal loan in Smart Banka completely online. Tap the amount in the top left corner in Overview or find it under ‘More’. There, you can find loans, overdraft, and even credit cards.

items.title: Early loan repayment
items.detail: Do you wish to repay your loan or at least a part of it early? Open the loan detail and select ‘Balloon Payment’. It is easy.

items.title: Messages and documents from the Bank
items.detail: Tap the Messages icon to find all important messages, notifications, and all documents concerning your products.

items.title: Changes to personal information
items.detail: Do you have a new ID, have you moved or changed your phone number? You can update your personal and contact information easily in the app by going to Settings and Profile, About Me.

items.title: Accessibility thanks to a reader and a large font
items.detail: Smart Banka can be easily managed via the voice assistant on your smartphone.

items.title: Secure login to Internet Banka
items.detail: Need a larger screen? Confirm logins to your Internet Banka via your Smart Banka.

items.title: Why is it important to keep Smart Banka up-to-date?
items.detail: Simply because hackers are resourceful and try their hardest to keep up with our security measures. That it why we are constantly improving Smart Banka to always step a couple steps ahead. Help us keep you and your finances safe and enable automatic updates of Smart Banka in your device Settings.

items.title: Information required by law
items.detail: From time to time you will be asked for some information about the use of your account. It is required by Act No. 253/2008 Coll. on the prevention of money laundering. Providing this information will not take more than a few minutes.

items.title: Add your card to your smartphone and the leave the plastic card at home
items.detail: Cards can be added to your smartphone immediately after arrangement, or later in ‘Card Detail’. Just tap the icon and follow the instructions. Thanks to biometrics, the card in your smartphone is better protected than your regular physical card.

items.title: Virtual card
items.detail: A virtual card only exists on your smartphone and does not have a physical plastic counterpart. It can still be used the same way nonetheless. Activate it in ‘Cards’ and choose from a selections of designs.

items.title: Business Loan
items.detail: A loan for business and entrepreneurs which does not require disclosure of tax returns or any collateral. And can be arranged completely online.

items.title: Mortgage repayment
items.detail: Balloon payments, paying off or refinancing your mortgage can be done easily in the app under ‘Mortgage Detail’.

items.title: Double-charge notifications
items.detail: If you make multiple payment orders to one bank account back to back, Smart Banka will notify you. You will be able to send the payment, but this is a safety measure to avoid making the same payment twice.

items.title: Scan an account number straight from an invoice
items.detail: Save time and avoid typos. Don’t enter the account number manually, instead, select ‘Scan Account Number’.

items.title: What is 3D Secure?
items.detail: It is a service that ensures secure card payments online. It and works on the principle of connecting a specific card to the bank. That is, for example, by entering the card number in an online store and confirming this specific payment in Smart Banka.

items.title: Open a Family Account for your child
items.detail: You can open a free-of-charge bank account your child as young as 8 years of age. The child will receive their own Smart Banka and an account which they can use to make payments and start saving. You can monitor the account, set limits and other rules in your own Smart Banka.

items.title: Pair a Family Account
items.detail: After opening a Family Account for your child, just scan the QR code in Smart Banka. The child will download their own Smart Banka and you will set limits and send them their first allowance.

items.title: Glossary and helpful tips in Family Account
items.detail: How to use an ATM? How to pay via card in a smartphone? What is an interest rate or savings? Your child can learn about all that and more right in the app.

items.title: Payments to Contact
items.detail: Send money directly to the phone numbers of the people saved in your contacts.

items.title: Search Through Account History
items.detail: If you're looking for a particular payment by account number, recipient name, or even a reference number, just open the account details and type in what you need in the search bar. You can find transactions dating back up to 2 years.

items.title: Filter Through Payments
items.detail: Need to check your monthly spending, incoming payments, or amounts within a specific range? Use the payment filter. You'll find it next to the search bar in the account details.

items.title: Where to Find IBAN for Foreign Payments
items.detail: Do you make or receive international payments? You'll find your account number in the international format (IBAN) and the BIC (SWIFT) code in the details of the specific account, where you can easily copy them.

items.title: Bank Accounts with Different Banks in Smart Banka
items.detail: Do you have accounts elsewhere? Add them to Smart Banka, and you'll instantly see their balances along with payment history.

items.title: Credit Top-Up
items.detail: You can easily top up your credit directly from your account. Just click on the three dots next to the account name and select ‘Top Up Credit’ from the menu.

items.title: Help with Smart Banka
items.detail: You can easily contribute to selected organizations directly through Smart Banka. Just open the More menu, select Useful Information, and choose the option Help with Smart Banka.

items.title: Pairing Smart Banka
items.detail: Even though you are currently using Smart Banka, we would like to remind you how to pair it again in the future, for example, when you get a new phone. Just log in to your Internet Banka, open the settings, select ‘Smart Banka’, and then follow the instructions.

items.title: List of Active Devices
items.detail: Phones may change, but Smart Banka stays the same. Go to Settings and Profile, and check the Device management section to ensure you've unpaired all your old devices.

items.title: Credit products tailored for you
items.detail: Loans, overdrafts, credit cards, mortgages, and other credit products can all be found in one place directly in Overview. After selecting the desired amount, you can proceed directly to the application process.

items.title: Separate Your Business from Personal Finances
items.detail: Whether you're a freelancer or a business owner, we've created an account designed specifically for your needs. Setting it up only takes a few minutes, and you can start using it right away.

items.title: Profile Switching for Enterpreneurs and Authorized Users
items.detail: Are you a business owner with multiple profiles in Smart Banka? You can switch between profiles easily in Settings without needing to log in and out.

items.title: No worries on holidays with travel insurance
items.detail: Travel insurance for the whole family, insurance of your valuables, or accident insurance can be arranged within a couple of minutes right in Smart Banka.

items.title: When the unexpected happens, report an insurance claim through Smart Banka
items.detail: While we can't prevent unexpected events, we strive to help you manage them. You can easily file insurance claims online, directly from your phone.
